verses.verse: If <S%H3588><s%> there <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and they <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> that the judges may <S%H8199>judge<s%> them; then they shall <S%H6663>justify<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> and <S%H7561>condemn<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man be worthy to be <S%H1121>beaten,<s%> <S%H5221><s%> that the <S%H8199>judge<s%> shall cause him to lie <S%H5307>down,<s%> and to be <S%H5221>beaten<s%> before his <S%H6440>face,<s%> according <S%H1767>to<s%> his <S%H7564>fault,<s%> by a certain <S%H4557>number.<s%>

Forty <S%H705><s%> stripes he may <S%H5221>give<s%> him, and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3254>exceed:<s%> <S%H6435>lest,<s%> if he should <S%H3254>exceed,<s%> and <S%H5221>beat<s%> him <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> with <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4347>stripes,<s%> then thy <S%H251>brother<s%> should seem <S%H7034>vile<s%> <S%H5869>unto<s%> thee.
Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2629>muzzle<s%> the <S%H7794>ox<s%> when he treadeth <S%H1758>out<s%> the corn.

If <S%H3588><s%> <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them <S%H4191>die,<s%> and have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1121>child,<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H4191>dead<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>marry<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> unto a <S%H376>stranger:<s%> <S%H2114><s%> her husband's <S%H2993>brother<s%> shall go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> her, and <S%H3947>take<s%> her to him to <S%H802>wife,<s%> and perform the duty of a husband's <S%H2992>brother<s%> unto her.

And it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> that the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> she <S%H3205>beareth<s%> shall <S%H6965>succeed<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H251>brother<s%> which is <S%H4191>dead,<s%> that his <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H3808>not<s%> put <S%H4229>out<s%> of <S%H4480>Israel.<s%> <S%H3478><s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2654>like<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> his brother's <S%H2994>wife,<s%> then let his brother's <S%H2994>wife<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H2205>elders,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> My husband's <S%H2993>brother<s%> <S%H3985>refuseth<s%> to raise <S%H6965>up<s%> unto his <S%H251>brother<s%> a <S%H8034>name<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> he <S%H14>will<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> perform the duty of my husband's <S%H2992>brother.<s%>

Then the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H7121>call<s%> him, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him: and if he <S%H5975>stand<s%> to it, and <S%H559>say,<s%> I <S%H2654>like<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> her;

Then shall his brother's <S%H2994>wife<s%> <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders,<s%> and <S%H2502>loose<s%> his <S%H5275>shoe<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> his <S%H7272>foot,<s%> and <S%H3417>spit<s%> in his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and shall <S%H6030>answer<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3602>So<s%> shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> unto that <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> build <S%H1129>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>
And his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> The <S%H1004>house<s%> of him that hath his <S%H5275>shoe<s%> <S%H2502>loosed.<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H5327>strive<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> with <S%H251>another,<s%> and the <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> draweth <S%H7126>near<s%> for to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of him that <S%H5221>smiteth<s%> him, and putteth <S%H7971>forth<s%> her <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H2388>taketh<s%> him by the secrets: <S%H4016><s%>
Then thou shalt cut <S%H7112>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H3709>hand,<s%> thine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2347>pity<s%> her.
Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> in thy <S%H3599>bag<s%> divers <S%H68>weights,<s%> <S%H68><s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> and a <S%H6996>small.<s%>
Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> in thine <S%H1004>house<s%> divers <S%H374>measures,<s%> <S%H374><s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> and a <S%H6996>small.<s%>

But thou shalt <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> and <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H68>weight,<s%> a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> and <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H374>measure<s%> shalt thou <S%H1961>have:<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> thy <S%H3117>days<s%> may be <S%H748>lengthened<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee.

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6213>do<s%> such <S%H428>things,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5766>unrighteously,<s%> are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God.<s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto thee by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> when ye were come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt;<s%> <S%H4714><s%>

How <S%H834><s%> he <S%H7136>met<s%> thee by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and smote the <S%H2179>hindmost<s%> of thee, even <S%H3605>all<s%> that were <S%H2826>feeble<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> thee, when <S%H859>thou<s%> wast <S%H5889>faint<s%> and <S%H3023>weary;<s%> and he <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

Therefore it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath given thee <S%H5117>rest<s%> from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> round <S%H4480>about,<s%> <S%H5439><s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, that thou shalt blot <S%H4229>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> of <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> from <S%H4480>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> it.
